entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 29. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023
